title: Bouncing Back
description: There was no doubt about it, it was time to get back in the saddle.A loveless marriage and a bitter divorce have left Vicky crying out for a physical and sexual makeover. So, when her best friend, Luna, owner of an exclusive escort agency, suggests she take on one of her clients – "just to get back out there," Vicky reluctantly agrees.International jet-setter, Axel Remington doesn't mix business with pleasure. Ever. But then he meets Vicky and the lines become blurred. Caught up in the moment, he breaks a cardinal rule and invites her back to his room.In one night, everything has changed…
author: Louise Rose-Innes
